To add buyer requirements to all of your listings: Go to the Account tab in My eBay, and select Site preferences. Under Selling preferences, click Show next to Buyer requirements, and then click Edit. On the Buyer Requirements page, select your buyer requirements. Blocking bidders and buyers. If you don't want to sell to certain members, you can put their user IDs on your blocked list. Members on the list can't bid on any of your listings until you remove them from the list.

To remove a member from your blocked list: Go to the Block bidders or buyers from your listings page. Delete the user ID of the member from the text box. Click Submit. Note: You should inform members after you remove them from your blocked list, so they can resume bidding on your items. Blocking bidders and buyers. To remove a member from your blocked list: Go to the Block bidders or buyers from your listings page. Delete the username of the member from the text box.
